item.title: Adidas Originals celebrates originality with the Born Original fragrance pair
item.description:
Source: adidas Originals. Adidas Originals, the renowned streetwear brand, introduces a new fragrance pair: Born Original. These dynamic scents, one for men and one for women, embody the spirit of embracing individuality and authenticity. Born Original reflects the energetic and empowering essence of the adidas Originals brand, grounded in individuality, authenticity, and imagination. The Born Original fragrances, For Him and For Her, present a vibrant blend of contrasting notes...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/adidas-originals-celebrates-originality-with-the-born-original-fragrance-pair/

item.title: With Lavotre, you have the ability to create your own custom watch design
item.description:
Source: Lavotre. Bently Anchor, an original design from Lavotre. Need a special corporate gift? Consider personalized watches. Eugene Chow, Brand Manager at Lavotre, explained that their journey started with a simple question: “What if we could create our own watches?” They noticed a gap in the market for personalized watches without minimum order requirements or limited to generic “couple” designs. Partnering with Cheryl Tan, head of sales and operations, they established Lavotre to fill this void...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/with-lavotre-you-have-the-ability-to-create-your-own-custom-watch-design/

item.title: HOOQ is launching new original content produced by Globe Studios
item.description:
Globe Studios and HOOQ are launching the first episode of their original series, “OTJ: The Missing 8,” in early 2017. This series promises a cinematic experience that’s different from typical television, mirroring the gritty and fast-paced style of the original movie, which premiered at the 2013 Cannes Film Festival. This six-part series, based on Erik Matti’s award-winning film “OTJ” (or “On The Job”), is the first major production made specifically for an online video service in the region...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hooq-is-launching-new-original-content-produced-by-globe-studios/
